org.gearvrf

Interface IRenderable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GVRRenderData, GVRRenderPass

    public interface IRenderable
    Interface for a renderable entity. Something is renderable if it has an attached mesh and material.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GVRContext getGVRContext() 
      GVRMaterial getMaterial()
      Get the GVRMaterial associated with this renderable entity.
      GVRMesh getMesh()
      Get the GVRMesh associated with this renderable entity.
      boolean isLightEnabled()
      Determine if this renderable uses light sources.
      void setShader(int shaderID, boolean isMultiview)
      Save the native Shader ID for this renderable.

    • Method Detail

      • getMaterial

        GVRMaterial getMaterial()
        Get the GVRMaterial associated with this renderable entity.
        Returns:
        GVRMaterial

      • getMesh

        GVRMesh getMesh()
        Get the GVRMesh associated with this renderable entity.
        Returns:
        GVRMesh

      • isLightEnabled

        boolean isLightEnabled()
        Determine if this renderable uses light sources.

      • setShader

        void setShader(int shaderID,
               boolean isMultiview)
        Save the native Shader ID for this renderable.
        Parameters:
        shaderID - integer representing a native shader ID generated by GVRShader#bindShader
